Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Letters from a Chechen Prison - Zarema and Her Rebel Family
programme.desc: The story of Zarema, kidnapped and imprisoned in Chechnya for defending human rights. Nine years in a penal colony: That is the sentence Zarema Musayeva has to serve because her sons rebelled against Chechen ruler Ramzan Kadyrov. Zarema’s family is doing everything they can to ensure she is not forgotten.

programme.title: Wall, Bunker, Green Belt - The New Culture of Remembrance
programme.desc: For almost forty years, it divided Germany, separating East and West. The day the Wall came down, on November 9, 1989, was a day of joy and happiness for the vast majority of people who lived in its vicinity.

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: Once the gold standard of engineering, Germany’s carmakers lost their edge — rocked by Dieselgate, slow to embrace EVs, and outpaced by Tesla and China. But 2025 looks different. Volkswagen is overtaking Tesla at home, tariffs are slowing down Chinese brands, and affordable small EVs are finally on the horizon. Is this the German comeback we’ve been waiting for — or just another blip?

programme.title: Made in Germany
programme.desc: In Berlin, Gambian designer Muhammed Jim Njie turns grief into circular fashion. His bold "Sahara” streetwear reclaims discarded textiles, transforms loss into style. Plus: croissants, courage, and community in Jakarta.

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: Once the gold standard of engineering, Germany’s carmakers lost their edge — rocked by Dieselgate, slow to embrace EVs, and outpaced by Tesla and China. But 2025 looks different. Volkswagen is overtaking Tesla at home, tariffs are slowing down Chinese brands, and affordable small EVs are finally on the horizon. Is this the German comeback we’ve been waiting for — or just another blip?

programme.desc: Perry thinks that a man who called asking to be defended on a charge of homicide is an old wartime buddy; guest Claude Akins.

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: Kelly assaults Gage with water bombs between rescue calls that include a child in a burning tree house and a boy who swallowed poison.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed work with young hot rodders in an effort to get them off the streets.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: The officers, aided by a helicopter relaying instructions, pursue robbery suspects.

programme.title: Barney Miller
programme.desc: Cops and robbers provide inspiration for a criminal who mimics the felonies of TV police shows; and a drunk attempts armed robbery without a gun.

programme.title: Barney Miller
programme.desc: The officers are unable to remove a corpse from the station house during a blizzard; and an eccentric swears that the snow is the start of a new ice age.

programme.title: The Jeffersons
programme.desc: Jenny's thesis research on street gangs teaches her a lesson in life.

programme.title: The Jeffersons
programme.desc: Louise's art class is assigned to sketch a nude model.

programme.desc: Beaver and Gilbert get spooked by strangers after watching a scary movie.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver talks his parents into buying him an expensive jacket.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: The boys face the inevitable problems of growing up. With Fred MacMurray, Stanley Livingston, Tim Considine and Don Grady.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: Robbie learns about chaperoning in Mexico.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed and his family are mistaken for a staff of crazy servants when they move into their new mansion.

programme.title: Joseph Prince
programme.desc: Finding hope even in the darkest days and toughest seasons through an encouraging program with Joseph.

programme.title: Amazing Facts With Doug Batchelor
programme.desc: Pastor Doug Batchelor reveals facts about biblical events and brings new insight to frequently asked questions in Christianity.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer Enjoying Everyday Life

programme.title: Life Today With James Robison

programme.title: Highway Patrol

programme.title: Highway Patrol

programme.desc: Judge Mablean Ephriam, who presided over "Divorce Court" from 1999-2006 as the first star of the revived version of the show, returns to the courtroom genre with his half-hour series that deals with life and the law. programme.title: The Verdict With Judge Hatchett
programme.desc: Judge Glenda Hatchett presided over her self-titled courtroom show from 2000-2008. Now, she returns to the medium with "The Verdict." In the half-hour series, the Atlanta native and former juvenile-court judge rules over small-claims cases brought in front of her. Hatchett's courtroom isn't just about finding someone guilty, though. She also uses her experience dealing with young people and her tough-love approach to help send a message to out-of-control juvenile offenders to try to set them on the right track in their lives.

programme.title: McMillan
programme.desc: Tom has an idea; the McMillan ranch will never be the same again.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: In windy Canyon, Texas, Jess visits West Texas A&M, where she interacts with a cloned cow, participates in a blind meat tasting experiment, and helps teach us how to break down a carcass into the cuts we see in the grocery store.

programme.title: Cast iron cowboy
programme.desc: Kent and Shannon cook chicken fried steak and Mexican chocolate cake for Oklahoma's oldest family owned ranch.

programme.title: Farming the Wild
programme.desc: Mike and the "Farming the Wild" crew need to get double figures on the ground in a busy 2 day fallow cull; lunch is venison meatball subs.

programme.title: United plates
programme.desc: This episode takes a gritty turn as Mario heads to the backwaters of Oklahoma to try his hand at noodling. The age-old, bare-handed method of catching giant catfish. But the thrill doesn't end at the catch.

programme.desc: David Blanton Hunts New Mexico and Tyler Jordan Heads to the Yukon.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Shock Therapy
programme.desc: Legendary hunter Jim Shockey joins Robbie Kroger of Blood Origins for a powerful, no-holds-barred conversation on wild adventures, conservation truths, and the soul of hunting.

programme.desc: Preparing for a disaster.

programme.title: Guns & Gear
programme.desc: Explore the new Ruger American Gen II in 22 ARC. Plus, new gear from SecureIT, Wheeler Tools, MeproLight, and Colt.

programme.title: Live 2 Hunt With Cody & Kelsy
programme.desc: Insane, close up moose action as Paulina tries to get her first bow animal!

programme.title: Beyond the Hunt
programme.desc: Rick & Julie share highs & lows of the year.

programme.title: Whitetail Freaks
programme.desc: A newcomer, Greg Davis, hunts for whitetails in Indiana.

programme.title: Addicted to the Outdoors
programme.desc: Come along as the Brunsons continue their look back; they look at some of the best moments from their career.

programme.title: Guns & Ammo TV
programme.desc: Preparing for a disaster.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E1 John Colter: King of the Mountain Men As a member of Lewis and Clark's Corps of Discovery, John Colter travels from the Missouri River all the way to the Pacific Ocean, but he decides not to return to the civilized East when the expedition ends. Entranced by the beauty and adventure of the wild frontier, he becomes one of America's first mountain men. As a hunter, trapper and explorer in his own right, he's the first American to see the Grand Tetons and the epic Yellowstone Valley. While his epic explorations make him famous, it's a harrowing ordeal with Blackfeet warriors that makes him a legend. After boldly venturing into territory controlled by the Blackfeet tribe, Colter is captured, stripped naked, and forced to run for his life as warriors give chase in what will come to be known as Colter's Run.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Flint McCullough Story Flint returns home to Fort Bridger to visit the man who raised him. A run-in with an enemy brings back painful memories of his time in the Confederate Army and the tragedy that ensued after falling in love with Jean Yates, a young Mormon.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E9 Blind Love Jimmy falls in love with a young woman, not realizing that she is married. He finds himself framed for a murder by the woman. The Kid and Lou come to Jimmy's aid, proving that he is innocent of the crime.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E4 Border Affair During the French occupation in Mexico, Cheyenne meets a beautiful princess who is engaged to marry an older French officer. He takes her to a rebel camp, where he learns her true identity.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Fear Merchants The Cartwrights help a Chinese-American stable hand who finds himself accused of murder. Opposing them is a manipulative mayoral candidate, Andrew Fulmer, a bigoted man who wants all foreigners to leave Virginia City.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E23 The Deserter A wounded Army deserter shows up at the McCain Ranch desperate for a horse. Lucas takes him in just as the Army Cavalry unit appears to take the deserter into custody. In town, the harsh commanding officer demands he be executed for desertion.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E24 The Vision Mark drinks some tainted water from a barrel and contracts typhoid fever. Lucas is forced to use an eccentric old doctor. During bouts of a continuous intense fever, Mark becomes delirious and has a vision of his deceased mother, who he never knew.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E25 The Lariat Lariat Jones, an old friend of Lucas', comes to North Fork to open up a new gambling casino. Jones has an excellent reputation as an honest gambler. But when two strangers become his partners, accusations of cheating become deadly for Jones.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E26 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E3 Unsaddled and Unraveled Booger heads to Austin to work with a former contestant in preparation for the Road to the Horse competition. He quickly realizes that there's more to this competition than handling a colt, and presentation has a lot to do with his score. Cody finds the perfect herd to start a special cattle sale and shares his idea for the business with Bubba, but he is hesitant. Once Booger is back, the cowboys meet to discuss the future of their business, but they don't all see eye-to-eye. Cody and Bubba want to be supportive of Booger but are frustrated that his dedication to the Road to the Horse competition has taken priority over their business. The lack of direction causes tension between the cowboys. Feeling divided, they all start to question the future of their business.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E4 Buckskin for the Win! The cowboys are unable to decide on exactly how they want to move their business forward. In the meantime, they continue to take day jobs to stay afloat. With Cody still fixated on the specialty cattle sale, Misty encourages him to do it on his own, without the help of Bubba and Booger. A new opportunity falls in Bubba's lap to operate a ranch for a group of organic feed investors. While it seems to be a dream role for Bubba, he struggles with the fact that it would require him to move his family north and away from the other cowboys. After much anticipation and practice, Booger heads to Kentucky for the Road to the Horse competition, where he faces the challenge of managing an unruly horse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E37 The Raid A renegade Apache named Chaqua raids the McCain Ranch and kidnaps Mark. Lucas gathers a group of men to get Mark back, but Chaqua plans to make him an Apache warrior since he lost his own son. Lucas will stop at nothing to get his son back to safety.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E1 Outlaw's Inheritance The townspeople of North Fork begin to get suspicious when Lucas is named as the beneficiary in the will of an infamous outlaw.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E12 Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E1 John Colter: King of the Mountain Men As a member of Lewis and Clark's Corps of Discovery, John Colter travels from the Missouri River all the way to the Pacific Ocean, but he decides not to return to the civilized East when the expedition ends. Entranced by the beauty and adventure of the wild frontier, he becomes one of America's first mountain men. programme.desc: S1 E2 The Fear Merchants The Cartwrights help a Chinese-American stable hand who finds himself accused of murder. Opposing them is a manipulative mayoral candidate, Andrew Fulmer, a bigoted man who wants all foreigners to leave Virginia City.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E25 The Lariat Lariat Jones, an old friend of Lucas', comes to North Fork to open up a new gambling casino. Jones has an excellent reputation as an honest gambler. But when two strangers become his partners, accusations of cheating become deadly for Jones.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E26 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.

programme.title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave
programme.desc: A boy enchanted with tales from the Old West unlocks a mystery that could save their family farm. While his widowed mother struggles to avoid foreclosure, a mysterious stranger arrives looking for a room to rent. A bond with the boy grows as the drifter recounts breathtaking stories of Shooter Green, a legendary gunslinger accused of Arizona's biggest gold robbery. The truth is revealed, along with the secret of the drifter's past when a crooked lawman appears, hot on the trail of the stolen gold. Past and present collide in this tale of action, adventure and drama. Stars Adam Baldwin (The Last Ship, Full Metal Jacket, The Patriot), Jeremy Sumpter (Peter Pan, Soul Surfer), Jill Wagner (Braven, Christmas Cookies), and Jet Jurgensmeyer (Last Man Standing, American Sniper).

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E38 Boomerang Sam Elder unexpectedly dies after the bank forecloses on his ranch Lucas takes in his son, who is now orphaned. Lucas teaches the boy how to use a gun, but Lucas doesn't know the boy plans to get revenge on the banker.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E39 The Mind Reader Rancher John Hallager is shot and killed in North Fork and young Billy Mathis is a prime suspect. Billy was seeing Hallager's daughter but was told to stay away. Lucas believes in Billy's innocence, and a clue may help.

programme.title: Buffalo Keepers
programme.desc: S1 E1 Today, the buffalo is the quintessential symbol of strength, freedom, and the unspoiled American West. But in the late 1800s, the nation's buffalo were nearly wiped out by ruthless hide hunters. Those majestic herds, which once numbered in the tens of millions, were down to less than 500 animals. This is the story of the handful of determined men and women who mobilized to save the ones that were left in a last-ditch effort to stave off extinction. Ranchers like Charles and Mary Ann Goodnight rescued orphaned buffalo calves and built small herds. Former buffalo hunters like Buffalo Bill helped build public sympathy. And politicians like Theodore Roosevelt helped pass laws to protect the remaining animals. The effort would be a generational one, with buffalo herds carefully tended, bred, and passed down to new stewards when their old protectors passed away. Thanks to their efforts, there are an estimated 500,000 buffalo thundering across America's grasslands once again.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E1 Bat Masterson Leaves the West After leaving Dodge City, Bat Masterson takes a job as manager of Denver's Palace Theatre. There he falls in love with Emma Walter, a jugging virtuoso known as the Queen of Clubs, and begins to question his life as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E6 Black Bart's Revenge Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E2 Jim Bridger: Forged on the Frontier With dreams of fortune and adventure, an 18-year-old Jim Bridger joins William Ashley's expedition to trap beaver along the Missouri River. But a grim ordeal soon forces Bridger to weigh his morals against the harsh reality of survival in the wild. A vicious grizzly bear attack leaves fellow trapper and hunter Hugh Glass on the verge of death and completely dependent upon Bridger's care. As a hostile band of Arikara warriors begins to close in, Bridger must choose between staying with the dying man and risking certain death, or leaving his injured comrade alone in the woods and fleeing to safety. In what becomes a legendary tale of the wild frontier, Bridger wrestles to choose between right and wrong, knowing the harsh retribution that will follow if he makes the wrong choice.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S3 E1 The Malachi Hobart Story Duke scouts a new passage through rough terrain. He meets a traveling preacher named Malachi Hobart during his trip. However, he soon discovers that Hobart is nothing more than a con man. Duke devises a plan to expose him.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave

programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: Rio Diablo
programme.desc: When a just-married couple is caught in the middle of a bank robbery, the bride is taken by the robbers. Now, the groom and a skilled bounty hunter search for the gang, hoping to find the bride alive.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Gunmen While in Texas, Joe and Hoss are mistaken for the Slade brothers who are involved in a feud between two families. In order to stop the fighting, they decide to turn to the women of the families for help.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Fear Merchants The Cartwrights help a Chinese-American stable hand who finds himself accused of murder. Opposing them is a manipulative mayoral candidate, Andrew Fulmer, a bigoted man who wants all foreigners to leave Virginia City.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E5 Kit Carson: The Greatest Scout in the West As a fur trapper, hunter, scout, and explorer, Kit Carson is an irresistible subject for reporters and novelists, and his incredible adventures make him a mythic figure in his own lifetime. Yet fame is the last thing on Carson's mind in 1849. All he wants to do is settle down to a quiet life with his wife on the family ranch, but once again fate comes calling. When settler Ann White is captured by an Apache raiding party, the Army seeks out Carson to help track the warriors and rescue Mrs. White, whose husband was killed in the raid. Although known to be the best tracker in the history of the Western Frontier, Carson admits this is the most difficult trail he has ever followed. He leads the military on a desperate chase, tracking the Apache through 200 miles of treacherous western wilderness. When they finally catch up with the Apache, the aftermath leaves Carson haunted for the rest of his days.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E15 Charles M. Russell: The Cowboy Artist Charlie Russell is an aimless cowhand who loves the freedom of the cowboy way of life, and he is a self-taught artist who enjoys capturing the scenes of his rugged work on the range. Too embarrassed to ask people to pay for his paintings, he gives most of them away to friends or trades them for drinks at the saloon. But that changes quickly after he falls in love. Charlie's new bride Nancy gives him the encouragement he needs to stop cowboying in order to focus on his artwork. Under her watchful eye, he sobers up, stops cowboying, and improves his mastery of painting. Nancy is so proud of Charlie's talent that she doesn't hesitate to ask top dollar for his paintings. Years later, when legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson tries to do a piece on Charlie, he quickly realizes that he must first deal with the woman behind the famous cowboy artist Charles M. Russell.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Legend of Nat Love When Black cowboy Nat Love overnights in Deadwood during a cattle drive, he decides to enter a Fourth of July cowboy competition. Confident in his roping, riding, and shooting skills, he is eager to test his mettle against the best cowboys around.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E10 The Wedding Rings After a stray bullet kills a young boy's father, Cheyenne befriends Pepe and takes him to his mother in Mexico. They meet Pepe's grandfather, a rising dictator of a province who's demanding tax payments in the form of wedding rings from villagers.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S5 E1 Alias Bill Hawks Bill Hawks rides into a prairie town looking for his old Indian friend, but soon realizes he is not welcome. He discovers that the townspeople are drilling a well on his friend's land and won't give him any information on his whereabouts.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A Colorado rancher contends with his two sons, one biological and the other adopted, who are fighting over control of the massive family property. Which brother will come out on top in this family battle for cash and cattle?

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger crosses paths with a frontier family traveling to the Wyoming Territory. He becomes the family's defender against a ruthless gang bent on taking all they have and robbing them of their dreams, lives, and futures.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E25 The Prisoner When two ex-Confederate officers come to town, trouble ensues for Lucas as he was a lieutenant in the 8th Indiana which defeated the 12th Cavalry 15 years ago. The beaten men were sent to a Union prison camp and now want revenge on Lucas.

programme.title: Rio Diablo
programme.desc: When a just-married couple is caught in the middle of a bank robbery, the bride is taken by the robbers. Now, the groom and a skilled bounty hunter search for the gang, hoping to find the bride alive.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A Colorado rancher contends with his two sons, one biological and the other adopted, who are fighting over control of the massive family property. Which brother will come out on top in this family battle for cash and cattle?

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger crosses paths with a frontier family traveling to the Wyoming Territory. He becomes the family's defender against a ruthless gang bent on taking all they have and robbing them of their dreams, lives, and futures.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: In 1866, the Reno Brothers gang is ravaging Indiana. When a detective agency sends a man to infiltrate the gang by posing as an outlaw, he sets a trap to capture the gang during an early-morning train robbery.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E19 Lessons Learned After his overturned conviction, a gunslinger named Randle seeks the men who testified against him and put him in jail. Meanwhile, Teaspoon's ex-wife, Polly, comes to Rock Creek to buy a saloon, but unfortunately becomes Randle's focus.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E11 The Apprentice Sheriff Dan Willard fills in as deputy while Marshal Micah Torrance is away on business. Meanwhile, Texas cowhands come to town looking for fun and relaxation. When Dan tries to prove that his toughness, those actions backfire.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Angry Gun Lucas and Mark, returning after selling their herd, share the stagecoach trip with a marshal and his prisoner, Johnny Cotton. Johnny's gang stops and robs the stagecoach, while Johnny steals Lucas' gun and profits. Lucas is forced to track him down.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E3 Bronco Bill's Treasure When Bronco Bill and his gang are robbing trains at will, two veteran lawmen join forces to stop the violent outlaws once and for all. Years later, gunfighter-turned-reporter Bat Masterson hears the story from the last surviving member of the gang.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E1 Mountain Fortress Cheyenne and his friend Smitty rescue a stagecoach driver and a woman passenger after a Shoshone attack. They all soon find themselves in a big predicament when an outlaw gang traps them at a mountain hideout.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Big-city lawyer Casey McKay, (Eric Close - Nashville, Without a Trace) a winner with a long hot streak, didn't expect the mysterious text from his ex-wife, Pru, (Tanya Clarke - A Beautiful Mind, Guiding Light) about her brother, Jay. No stranger to being on the wrong side of the law, Jay is accused of murdering a District Attorney. Casey takes the case, but soon discovers this will be no ordinary legal defense. Teaming up with eccentric ex-marine turned motel owner and P.I. "Ex" Clemens, (Nick Searcy - Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan - Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: An Apache warrior chief is willing to offer gold, and even sacrifice some of his men, to get his hands on Richard J. Gatling's powerful invention. It's up to a cavalry lieutenant, his scout, and a tough rancher to end the chief's deadly ambition.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E28 The Challenge An escaped killer wants to prove he hasn't lost his nerve when he holds up North Fork's General Store and takes Marshal Micah Torrance hostage. He provokes the town to try to face him, but only Lucas is strong enough to rise up to his challenge.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: In 1866, the Reno Brothers gang is ravaging Indiana. When a detective agency sends a man to infiltrate the gang by posing as an outlaw, he sets a trap to capture the gang during an early-morning train robbery.

"Ex" Clemens, (Nick Searcy - Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan - Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: An Apache warrior chief is willing to offer gold, and even sacrifice some of his men, to get his hands on Richard J. Gatling's powerful invention. It's up to a cavalry lieutenant, his scout, and a tough rancher to end the chief's deadly ambition.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E5 Buck Up, Cowboy With Booger still at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba are left to do the day-to-day work. Bubba surprises Cody with news that he has to head to Mississippi to help his father-in-law. Cody has to take care of the ranch by himself, adding to his frustrations with the business. Luckily for him, Misty steps in to help. Bubba breaks the news to Kaley's parents that they might be moving north for a new job opportunity. After a bit of hesitation, they show their support - just in time for Bubba and Kaley to check out a ranch that could potentially be their future home. Cody visits possible sites for his specialty cattle sale and feels discouraged until he comes across the perfect location. Meanwhile, Booger starts the second round in the Road to the Horse competition, and things don't go as planned. In the end, he makes a tough decision and puts what's best for the horse ahead of winning.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E6 Partnership Hits the Fan While volunteering with kids in the community, Cody makes a connection with a possible buyer for his specialty cattle sale. With Booger still away at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba recruit a friend to help with the work on the ranch. Cody rushes to finish up for the day, determined to make it home in time for his son's first haircut, but in his haste, he ends up hurting himself. Bubba visits an organic ranch in Texas to learn more about the organic business. To test the product, he cooks up store brand and grass-fed steaks to compare the taste and make sure it is something he can get behind. Booger finally gets home after the competition and immediately receives an opportunity to train horses in Austin. After spending some time apart, the cowboys come together to talk about the future of their partnership. Things take a turn for the worse when the meeting between friends gets heated, leaving the fate of their business up in the air.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Patsy Sully Hobbs and his outlaw gang ride to North Fork intent on taking over the town. They must first get rid of Lucas McCain without involving themselves. To do so, the gang forces the barber to fight Lucas, but Lucas suspects something is amiss.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Bloodlines The North Fork Saloon is ransacked by the Malakie brothers, who are three rough mountain men. A fight breaks out and one brother is killed. Lucas is blamed and when their father arrives, he vows vengeance.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E10 The Keepsake A young woman named Amanda comes to Sweetwater, claiming to be Teaspoon's daughter. But she and her companion's true intentions are to steal a keepsake worth a small fortune that once belonged to Teaspoon's dead daughter.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E27 Shotgun Man Lucas receives several mysterious threatening notes. He discovers they are being sent from ex-convict, John Beaumont, who is bent on revenge. Beaumont wants Lucas dead since he is the one responsible for his imprisonment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E28 Sins of the Father Andy Moon and his young son, Bobby, take shelter at the McCain Ranch. Andy killed a man in a gunfight in self-defense. Now, the man's brothers are after Moon. Complications arise when Bobby discovers the truth about their running from town to town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E29 The Prodigal A bank robber hides at the McCain Ranch and takes Lucas and Mark hostage. Problems arise when the gunman's mother shows up, believing he owns the ranch and Mark is her grandson. The truth comes out when more gunmen arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E30 The Fourflusher Sharecropper Gabe Fenway enters his horse, Sapphire, in a race. His landlord, Jake Preston, bets Fenway that Mark's horse, Blueboy, will win. Preston wants Fenway's farm and bets $1000 against his whole year of crops. He will stop at nothing to win.

programme.title: PUBG Global Invitational
programme.desc: Twenty top professional PUBG teams from around the world will compete for $2 million in prizes and the ultimate PUBG bragging rights. From Mercedes-Benz Arena in Berlin, Germany.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove
programme.desc: Two former Texas Rangers renew their spirit of adventure as they and other residents of a Texas town join a cattle drive to the Montana Territory.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove
programme.desc: Call (Tommy Lee Jones) and Gus (Robert Duvall) are forced into a confrontation with an old enemy who kidnaps and brutalizes Lorena.

programme.title: The Brothers Rico
programme.desc: Former Mafia bookkeeper Eddie Rico (Richard Conte) has decided to go straight and lives with his wife in Florida, where they plan to adopt a child. However, his brothers, Johnny (James Darren) and Gino (Paul Picerni), still work for his ex-boss, Sid Kubik (Larry Gates) -- and, when Eddie finds out their lives are in danger, he tries to re-establish his connection to the world he thought he had left behind. But when one of his brothers is killed, Eddie realizes that he may be next.

programme.title: Cash on Demand
programme.desc: A British banker (Peter Cushing) pretends to cooperate with a would-be robber (Andre Morell) holding his wife and son.

programme.title: The Garment Jungle
programme.desc: New York garment factory owner Walter Mitchell (Lee J. Cobb) goes the extra, deceitful mile in battling his employees' efforts to unionize. He hires gangster Artie Ravage (Richard Boone) to interfere with the grassroots efforts. After Mitchell's son, Alan (Kerwin Matthews), returns from Europe and befriends one of the union organizers (Robert Loggia), Mitchell eventually tries to mend his unethical ways. Unfortunately, this does not sit well with the violent, vengeful Ravage.

programme.title: The 39 Steps
programme.desc: While on vacation in London, Canadian Richard Hannay (Robert Donat) becomes embroiled in an international spy ring related to the mysterious "39 steps." Then he meets agent Annabella Smith (Lucie Mannheim), who is soon killed in his apartment. He must elude the police, who are hunting him for murder, while he tries to stop Professor Jordan (Godfrey Tearle) from sending secrets out of the country. Hannay is assisted by Pamela (Madeleine Carroll), an unwilling accomplice who discovers the truth.

programme.title: The Fatal Mallet
programme.desc: Three men play dirty tricks to charm a beautiful young woman.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid in Old New Mexico
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Duncan Renaldo) and Pancho (Martin Garralaga) free a girl (Gwen Kenyon) accused of murder, then find the killer.

programme.title: Law of the Canyon
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his sidekick (Smiley Burnette) bust a frontier protection racket.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Two men wanted by a Cheyenne tribe for murder seek refuge in Dodge City, and although Earp arrests the pair, the city refuses to press charges because the victims were Indians.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Watson finds Holmes still alive three years after his reported death at Moriarty's hands.

programme.title: The Brothers Rico
programme.desc: Former Mafia bookkeeper Eddie Rico (Richard Conte) has decided to go straight and lives with his wife in Florida, where they plan to adopt a child. However, his brothers, Johnny (James Darren) and Gino (Paul Picerni), still work for his ex-boss, Sid Kubik (Larry Gates) -- and, when Eddie finds out their lives are in danger, he tries to re-establish his connection to the world he thought he had left behind. But when one of his brothers is killed, Eddie realizes that he may be next.

programme.title: Cash on Demand
programme.desc: A British banker (Peter Cushing) pretends to cooperate with a would-be robber (Andre Morell) holding his wife and son.

Unfortunately, this does not sit well with the violent, vengeful Ravage.

programme.title: Law of the Canyon
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his sidekick (Smiley Burnette) bust a frontier protection racket.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove
programme.desc: Call (Tommy Lee Jones) and Gus (Robert Duvall) are forced into a confrontation with an old enemy who kidnaps and brutalizes Lorena.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove
programme.desc: Jake's (Robert Urich) involvement with the Suggs gang reaches a tragic climax; Gus reunites with an old flame (Anjelica Houston).

programme.title: Sirocco
programme.desc: American Harry Smith (Humphrey Bogart) is selling guns to Emir Hassan (Onslow Stevens), whose Syrian rebels are battling occupying French troops. Hoping to stem the fighting, French Col. Feroud (Lee J. Cobb) asks Harry to introduce him to Hassan. Meanwhile, Feroud's girlfriend, Violette (Märta Torén), is increasingly drawn to Harry. While she wants Harry to ferry her out of the dangerous country, he boldly tries to make a profit from his dealings with both Hassan and Feroud.

programme.title: Framed
programme.desc: Truck driver Mike Lambert (Glenn Ford) is a down-and-out mining engineer searching for a job. When his rig breaks down in a small town, he happens upon Paula Craig (Janis Carter), a venomous seductress. When Craig's boyfriend, Steve Price (Barry Sullivan), robs a bank, they intend to frame Lambert, but Craig murders Price, takes the money and convinces Lambert that he killed Price in a blackout. Lambert is ready to skip town, until he learns a friend is set to take the fall.

programme.title: The Night Holds Terror
programme.desc: Three hitchhikers hold a factory worker (Jack Kelly) and his family for ransom after they determine his father is very wealthy.

programme.title: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
programme.desc: The life of celebrated American writer Harry Street (Gregory Peck) flashes back before his eyes as he lies dying from a wound suffered at the foot of Tanzania's Mount Kilimanjaro. As he is tended to by his traveling companion, Helen (Susan Hayward), he recalls many things: his first wife and Paris literary inspiration, Cynthia Green (Ava Gardner) ; his second wife, Countess Liz (Hildegarde Neff) ; and his formative years with uncle Bill (Leo G. Carroll).

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: When defiant female rancher Sierra Nevada Jones (Barbara Stanwyck) sweeps into Montana, she receives a hostile welcome from a tribe of Native Americans who attack her cattle and leave her father dead. Kindly Indian brave Colorados (Lance Fuller) and government officer Farrell (Ronald Reagan) help Sierra fight for her land against treacherous locals like the envious Tom McCord (Gene Evans), a neighboring rancher determined to cheat Jones out of her property and drive her back to Texas.

programme.title: Riders of the Badlands
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger's uncanny resemblance to a wanted outlaw results in his own arrest by a fellow lawman.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid Returns
programme.desc: Pancho and the Kid attempt to prove that they did not kidnap the child they are protecting from a killer.

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: When Mildred Pierce's wealthy husband leaves her for another woman, Mildred decides to raise her two daughters on her own. Despite Mildred's financial successes in the restaurant business, her oldest daughter, Veda, resents her mother for degrading their social status. In the midst of a police investigation after the death of her second husband, Mildred must evaluate her own freedom and her complicated relationship with her daughter.

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: A psychopath (Robert Walker) and a tennis player (Farley Granger) meet in a club car and plot that each will murder someone for the other.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove

programme.title: Word of God Ministries
programme.desc: Pastor James McMenis and his wife Chrissy are dedicated to winning the lost to Jesus and making disciples of the saved. Their goal is to bring clarity to the Word of God, making it life-applicable to people everywhere.

programme.title: The Catholic Mass
programme.desc: The Heart of the nation Sunday mass brings the beauty and traditions of the Catholic faith.

programme.title: Perry Stone
programme.desc: Religious teachings from Perry Stone.

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: After her cheating husband leaves her, Mildred Pierce proves she can become independent and successful, but can't win the approval of her spoiled daughter.

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: A psychopath (Robert Walker) and a tennis player (Farley Granger) meet in a club car and plot that each will murder someone for the other.

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid (Jack Buetel), Doc Holliday (Walter Huston) and Pat Garrett hang out with a hussy (Jane Russell).

programme.title: A Bullet Is Waiting
programme.desc: Storms trap a Utah sheriff (Stephen McNally) and his prisoner (Rory Calhoun) in a coastal cabin with a professor's daughter (Jean Simmons).

programme.title: Bad for Each Other
programme.desc: Dr. Tom Owen (Charlton Heston) is an Army doctor on leave to visit his mother, who still lives in the poor Pennsylvania mining town where he grew up. After falling in love with wealthy socialite Helen Curtis (Lizabeth Scott), Tom turns down a position as the local doctor and takes a lucrative job at an elite Pittsburgh clinic. Though he's happy with his newfound success and his recent engagement to Helen, a cave-in at the town mine forces Tom to decide where his heart really lies.

programme.title: Too Late for Tears
programme.desc: A woman (Lizabeth Scott) kills her husband and plots with a private eye (Dan Duryea) after someone tosses a moneybag into her car.

programme.title: Johnny O'Clock
programme.desc: When an employee at an illegal gambling den dies suspiciously, her sister, Nancy (Evelyn Keyes), looks into the situation and falls for Johnny O'Clock (Dick Powell), a suave partner in the underground casino. Selfish and non-committal by nature, Johnny slowly begins to return Nancy's affection and decides to run away with her, but conflict within his business threatens their plans. As Johnny tries to distance himself from the casino, his shady past comes back to haunt him.

programme.title: Bad Blonde
programme.desc: An Italian boxing manager's (Frederick Valk) wife (Barbara Payton) tricks her heavyweight Irish lover (Tony Wright) into helping kill her husband.

programme.title: D.O.A.
programme.desc: Frank Bigelow (Edmond O'Brien) is about to die, and he knows it. The accountant has been poisoned and has only 24 hours before the lethal concoction kills him. Determined to find out who his murderer is, Frank, with the help of his assistant and girlfriend, Paula (Pamela Britton), begins to trace back over his last steps. As he frantically tries to unravel the mystery behind his own impending demise, his sleuthing leads him to a group of crooked businessmen and another murder.

programme.title: Trail of the Rustlers
programme.desc: When a member of the villainous Mahoney family is slain while escaping the jail cell he'd been put in by Steve Armitage (Charles Starrett), aka the Durango Kid, the dead man's relatives vow to take down the Kid by any means necessary. Chick Mahoney (Don Harvey) poses as the Kid and tries to ruin the cowboy's reputation by stealing from nearby ranchers, but with the help of sidekick Smiley Burnette (Smiley Burnette), the Kid sets out to retrieve the stolen goods and repair his good name.

programme.title: Feudin' Rhythm
programme.desc: A snooty sponsor wants the star (Eddy Arnold) of a country-western radio show fired because she wants him kept away from her nephew, who happens to be the singer's son.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp must convince a disgraced Army captain that he holds no responsibility for Gen. Custer's devastating loss at Little Big Horn, but angry newcomers with a group of captive Indians seek to take revenge on the captain for the defeat.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes connects a missing teacher and a past mystery when a duke's son is kidnapped.

programme.title: Bad for Each Other
programme.desc: Dr. Tom Owen (Charlton Heston) is an Army doctor on leave to visit his mother, who still lives in the poor Pennsylvania mining town where he grew up. After falling in love with wealthy socialite Helen Curtis (Lizabeth Scott), Tom turns down a position as the local doctor and takes a lucrative job at an elite Pittsburgh clinic. Though he's happy with his newfound success and his recent engagement to Helen, a cave-in at the town mine forces Tom to decide where his heart really lies.

programme.title: Too Late for Tears
programme.desc: A woman (Lizabeth Scott) kills her husband and plots with a private eye (Dan Duryea) after someone tosses a moneybag into her car.

programme.title: Johnny O'Clock
programme.desc: When an employee at an illegal gambling den dies suspiciously, her sister, Nancy (Evelyn Keyes), looks into the situation and falls for Johnny O'Clock (Dick Powell), a suave partner in the underground casino. Selfish and non-committal by nature, Johnny slowly begins to return Nancy's affection and decides to run away with her, but conflict within his business threatens their plans. As Johnny tries to distance himself from the casino, his shady past comes back to haunt him.

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos
programme.desc: A night rider (George "Gabby" Hayes) and his singing partner (Roy Rogers) send Texas carpetbaggers packing.

programme.title: A Bullet Is Waiting
programme.desc: Storms trap a Utah sheriff (Stephen McNally) and his prisoner (Rory Calhoun) in a coastal cabin with a professor's daughter (Jean Simmons).

programme.title: Gunfighters
programme.desc: In Texas, gunfighter Brazos Kane (Randolph Scott) decides to lay down his guns for good and rides out to visit his best friend -- only to witness his murder. When Brazos takes the body to the nearby ranch of the powerful Banner (Griff Barnett), the rancher accuses him of the murder. Brazos leaves Banner's daughter, Bess (Barbara Britton), a vital piece of evidence in the crime, and then must evade Banner and a crooked sheriff as he reluctantly takes up arms to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Maltese Falcon
programme.desc: In this noir classic, detective Sam Spade (Humphrey Bogart) gets more than he bargained for when he takes a case brought to him by a beautiful but secretive woman (Mary Astor). As soon as Miss Wonderly shows up, trouble follows as Sam's partner is murdered and Sam is accosted by a man (Peter Lorre) demanding he locate a valuable statuette. Sam, entangled in a dangerous web of crime and intrigue, soon realizes he must find the one thing they all seem to want: the bejeweled Maltese falcon.

programme.title: The Family Secret
programme.desc: After David Clark (John Derek) kills his drunk, violent friend Art, he explains to his lawyer father, Howard (Lee J. Cobb), that he acted in self-defense. Howard lets David decide whether or not to confess. Disappointed when David refuses to admit to his crime, Howard is further disturbed when district attorney George Redman (Santos Ortega) prepares to prosecute Joe Elsner (Whit Bissell), a bookie Art was in debt to. When his son still refuses to turn himself in, Howard agrees to defend Joe.

programme.title: Assignment -- Paris
programme.desc: Cocky investigative reporter Jimmy Race (Dana Andrews) and his idealistic rival, Jeanne Moray (Märta Torén), tangle over international espionage and Cold War tensions in Communist Hungary. While following an explosive story about an accused American spy, Jimmy inadvertently brings the unwanted attention of Hungarian agent Anton Borvitch (Donald Randolph) to Jeanne's ongoing investigation of possible collusion between Hungarian and Yugoslavian politicians, endangering both reporters' lives.

programme.title: Blackout
programme.desc: Casey (Dane Clark), a U.S. Army veteran living in London, is nearly broke and drowning his sorrows in booze. But then he meets Phyllis (Belinda Lee), a stunning blonde with money to spare who offers Casey cash to marry her. Suspicious but with nothing to lose, Casey agrees, only to wake up the next day hungover, confused and in a stranger's room with blood on his coat. Phyllis is nowhere to be seen -- except in the newspapers. It turns out her father was murdered, and all clues point to Casey.

programme.title: The Pawnshop
programme.desc: Charlie competes with a fellow shop assistant.

programme.title: South of Monterey
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Gilbert Roland), Pancho (Martin Garralaga) and a dancer try to outfox a swindler.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: After an altercation between a drunk soldier and a Cherokee civilian results in death, Earp takes the soldier into custody and fights off his captain's attempts to free him.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A bloodstain provides Holmes with a clue in the theft of a vital government document.

programme.title: The Maltese Falcon
programme.desc: In this noir classic, detective Sam Spade (Humphrey Bogart) gets more than he bargained for when he takes a case brought to him by a beautiful but secretive woman (Mary Astor). As soon as Miss Wonderly shows up, trouble follows as Sam's partner is murdered and Sam is accosted by a man (Peter Lorre) demanding he locate a valuable statuette. Sam, entangled in a dangerous web of crime and intrigue, soon realizes he must find the one thing they all seem to want: the bejeweled Maltese falcon.

The show, which was originally titled "Bloomberg West," is anchored by Emily Chang in San Francisco.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Real Yield
programme.desc: Not everyone has a lot of money to invest, which is why Bloomberg has financial indices that are based on fixed income, which is also the focus on this weekly show. programme.desc: Bloomberg's Matt Miller, Katie Greifeld and Eric Balchunas are joined by leaders in the market, providing critical intelligence to finance advisers and investors of ETFs.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: The most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg: Balance of Power
programme.desc: Focusing on the intersection of politics and global business.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Businessweek
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the worlds of business and finance and the interesting stories of global technology, politics, economics and more.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg: The Close
programme.desc: Alix Steel, Romaine Bostick and Scarlet Fu own the market-moving breaking news around the closing bell; a synthesis of the top stories; key insights from investors, strategists and the companies of today and tomorrow.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg: Balance of Power
programme.desc: Focusing on the intersection of politics and global business.

programme.title: The Deal With Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly sit with Super Bowl winner and Goldman Sachs Managing Director Justin Tuck to talk about the pressure of playing in New York and his transition from football to finance.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer
programme.desc: Chief Financial Officers now play a critical role in shaping corporate strategy and positioning organizations; profiling AT&T CFO Pascal Desroches, who has partnered with John Stankey to restructure the company.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
programme.desc: Bringing global investors everything you need to know as the trading day begins in Asia. Bloomberg TV is live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg: The China Show
programme.desc: From politics and policy to tech and trends, Yvonne Man and David Ingles give global investors insight into the world's second-biggest economy, delivering in-depth discussions with newsmakers.

programme.title: The Deal With Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly sit with Super Bowl winner and Goldman Sachs Managing Director Justin Tuck to talk about the pressure of playing in New York and his transition from football to finance.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer
programme.desc: Chief Financial Officers now play a critical role in shaping corporate strategy and positioning organizations; profiling AT&T CFO Pascal Desroches, who has partnered with John Stankey to restructure the company.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: In an effort to provide extensive coverage of worldwide financial markets, Bloomberg features several regional shows under the "Bloomberg Markets" banner, with each focusing on that geographic area's markets. This Asian-focused version is hosted by Shery Ahn, David Ingles, Haidi Lun, Rishaad Salamat and Angie Lau. They report the latest business news and speak with the likes of political and business leaders to help investors make investment decisions that build their portfolios.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East & Africa
programme.desc: A spotlight on the fast paced growth and major deals happening across the Middle East and Africa, linking the market drivers from overnight in the U.S. and across Asia into the region's trading day, with deep-dive analysis of the top businesses.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: From London, essential morning viewing to stay ahead of the day's market trends with news stories from the U.S. and Asia in the lead-up to the opening of European markets.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg The Opening Trade
programme.desc: "The Opening Trade" explores things to know as markets open across Europe; analysis that isn't available anywhere else, a break down of the biggest stories of the day and top guests who have skin in the game.

programme.title: Live: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Based in London, Francine Lacqua speaks with guests about global business, economics, finance and politics.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: "Bloomberg Brief" delivers the market news, data and analysis viewers need to set their agendas.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Jonathan, Lisa and Annmarie survey the economy and global markets with daily conversations with leaders and decision makers, from Wall Street to Washington and beyond, to cover the latest in business, investment and geopolitics.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Delivering the market-moving news anyone needs to know to get a jump start on the U.S. trading day.

programme.title: Think Big
programme.desc: Children are the future -- and so are their inventions, which is why "Think Big" could be an important show. It features young inventors competing to see who can come up with the most-innovative invention. Each episode features two teams in the Think Tank -- a studio filled with art supplies and construction materials -- who brainstorm and choose materials before sketching, designing and building a prototype to be presented to a judge, who determines a winner. The champions earn bragging rights and the coveted Genius Cup.

programme.title: Biz Kids
programme.desc: "Biz Kids" is an educational television show that teaches financial education and entrepreneurship to a preteen audience. It uses sketch comedy and young actors to explain basic economic concepts.

programme.title: America's Heartland
programme.desc: Much of the food Americans eat is produced by farmers and ranchers in the country's heartland, but many people don't know how it's produced. "America's Heartland" provides information about the people and processes responsible for the availability of food and fuel across the country and around the world. The show's reporters and producers tell stories in topics that include farm families, consumer issues, animal welfare and crop sustainability. Some episodes also take the show abroad to countries such as Egypt and Taiwan to show the impact American agriculture has on the global economy.

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: When defiant female rancher Sierra Nevada Jones (Barbara Stanwyck) sweeps into Montana, she receives a hostile welcome from a tribe of Native Americans who attack her cattle and leave her father dead. Kindly Indian brave Colorados (Lance Fuller) and government officer Farrell (Ronald Reagan) help Sierra fight for her land against treacherous locals like the envious Tom McCord (Gene Evans), a neighboring rancher determined to cheat Jones out of her property and drive her back to Texas.

programme.title: See How They Run
programme.desc: (2022) Comic whodunnit set amid a play. A director's been killed and the body's going stiff. Can two cops solve it? With Sam Rockwell, Saoirse Ronan and Reece Shearsmith. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: (2019) Quirky whodunnit with Daniel Craig as Benoit Blanc, an eccentric detective. A rich man's been killed and everyone has a motive, so Benoit must be extra perceptive. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Hyde Park on Hudson
programme.desc: (2012) Fact-based drama. It's 1939 and King George VI (Samuel West) and Queen Elizabeth (Olivia Colman) visit president FD Roosevelt (Bill Murray) to secure help against the Nazis.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Black Arrow
programme.desc: (1948) Historical adventure. A man (Louis Hayward) returns from the Wars of the Roses to learn from his uncle that a family friend has killed his father. But is everything as it seems?

programme.title: Gift Horse
programme.desc: (1952) War drama. Trevor Howard plays the captain of an ageing US warship, gifted to the British navy, which is chosen to lead the raid on Saint-Nazaire in 1942. With Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: Young Winston
programme.desc: (1972) Biopic charting the rise of the future PM from battered Harrow pupil to MP via military action on foreign soil. Directed by Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: The Moonraker
programme.desc: (1958) Romantic thriller. George Baker stars as a heroic Cavalier horseman, beating off the Roundhead foe as he single-handedly smuggles the country's aristocracy to safety in France.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: (2015) Comedy starring Mark Wahlberg, Will Ferrell and Linda Cardellini. A man's living happily with his wife and stepchildren - until the kids' biological dad swaggers back onto the scene.

programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: (2023) Action thriller starring Gerard Butler as an airline pilot who must become a one-man army after crashlanding on an island overrun by bad guys. To survive, he's gonna have to wing it.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: (2019) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic drama set in 60s LA, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt and Margot Robbie. A failing actor's world collides with the Manson Family.

programme.title: Slow West
programme.desc: (2015) Violent offbeat western starring Kodi Smit-McPhee and Michael Fassbender. A 16-year-old Scottish lad travels to 1870s Colorado on the trail of his true love.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: (1984) George C Scott stars in Clive Donner's adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic festive fantasy. The miserly curmudgeon Ebenezer Scrooge is visited by three ghosts of Christmas.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: (2009) Martial arts adventure. Justin Chatwin stars as the leader of a mystical band of warriors who are out to save the world from the ancient demon Lord Piccolo. With James Marsters.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: (1994) Comedy starring Joe Mantegna, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley. Inept criminals kidnap a millionaire's baby. But when the boy escapes, there's mayhem as they try to track him down.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: (2021) Heartfelt fact-based comedy-drama. Kevin Hart stars as a widower who is suddenly sprung into single fatherhood after his wife dies a day after giving birth.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: (2016) Sci-fi blockbuster sequel starring Jeff Goldblum. Twenty years after Earth repelled a devastating alien invasion, the extraterrestrials return to finish the job.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: (2018) Tom Cruise stars in part six of the action-thriller series. His mission: to stop terrorists from getting their hands on nuclear bombs and unleashing global devastation.

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: (1983) Al Pacino stars in Brian De Palma's classic crime thriller. A Cuban immigrant uses the coaine trade to take what he wants of the American dream. Say hello to my little friend.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: (1999) The Muppets are back in another feature-length adventure as Gonzo, convinced that he is of alien origin, struggles to communicate with his family in outer space.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: (2007) Supernatural thriller. Alexander Ludwig stars as The Seeker, who has the task of finding six items hidden throughout time, which the scary forces of The Dark are also looking for.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: (2018) Oscar-winning animated superhero adventure with the voices of Shameik Moore, Kathryn Hahn and Nicolas Cage. Can a gang of Spider-heroes save the universe from reality-bending chaos?

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: (2010) Family fantasy comedy. Dwayne Johnson stars as a tough ice hockey player who is transformed into a real-life fairy as punishment for telling a child that tooth fairies don't exist.

programme.title: Dog
programme.desc: (2022) Poignant road-trip comedy with Channing Tatum. A soldier with PTSD must escort a traumatised army canine to a comrade's funeral. Can man and dog save each other's lives?

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: (1985) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. To free his kidnapped daughter, an ex US commando must agree to assassinate a South American president. But he's not as pliant as he seems...

programme.title: American Woman
programme.desc: (2018) Emotional drama starring Sienna Miller. A woman must raise her grandson after her daughter disappears. With Christina Hendricks and Aaron Paul.

programme.title: You Are Not My Mother
programme.desc: (2021) Excruciatingly eerie family horror about a teenage girl who believes her mother has been swapped out after disappearing for a few days. Are there dark forces at work?

programme.title: LumoTV: Sign2Win
programme.desc: In this new family episode, teams consisting of a child and an adult compete for £1,000. Will we see a family feud as these teams face five challenging games?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: (1951) Drama. James Mason stars in Henry Hathaway's sympathetic portrait of Field Marshal Erwin Rommel in the final years of his life during the Second World War. With Jessica Tandy.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: (1956) Historical drama. The Oscar-winning Ingrid Bergman stars as an amnesiac refugee who Yul Brynner tries to pass off as the daughter of the murdered Tsar of Russia, Nicholas II.

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: (1951) Classic Ealing thriller filmed in a documentary style, starring Bonar Colleano as a sailor whose smuggling activities lead to him being suspected of murder and going on the run.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: (1950) Western. John Wayne plays the commander of a Texan fort at which his ex-wife (Maureen O'Hara) pitches up. Can he win back her love by saving kidnapped children from Apache raiders?

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: (2004) Drama. Dennis Quaid stars as the captain of an aircraft downed in the desert. There's no hope of rescue, unless he and the survivors can build another plane from the wreckage.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: (2022) Danger-zone action as Tom Cruise returns to the cockpit after 36 years. He's Maverick. He still feels the need for speed. And there's a near-impossible mission to fly. With Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Io Capitano
programme.desc: (2023) Matteo Garrone's heartfelt, harrowing drama about two Senegalese lads who make a dangerous journey across the Sahara to make their fortune as singers in Europe. English subs.

programme.title: The Guard
programme.desc: (2011) Comedy crime thriller starring Brendan Gleeson and Don Cheadle. A dead body and an FBI agent disrupt a rule-bending policeman's laid-back life on the west coast of Ireland.

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: (1955) A non-stop romp of a western from director Joseph H Lewis. In the town of Medicine Bend, only Marshal Calem Ware can keep its citizens from falling into complete lawlessness.

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: (1951) Second World War thriller. Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Robert Wagner star as divers with a special underwater demolition team taking the war to the Japanese in the Pacific.
